SEARCH
Package Interface.Server

Interface GameCommand

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientRMI, ClientSocket, GameController, Network
public interface GameCommand extends Remote
The GameCommand interface represents a remote interface for player commands. It defines methods for selecting tiles, inserting tiles, writing chat messages, and adding a scout to the game.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addScout(String playerID, Scout scout)
    Adds a scout with the specified player ID to the game.
    void
    insertTiles(String playerID, List<Integer> sort, int column)
    Inserts tiles by a player with the specified player ID into the specified column.
    void
    selectTiles(String playerID, List<Coordinates> coordinates)
    Selects tiles by a player with the specified player ID.
    void
    writeChat(String from, String message, String to)
    Writes a chat message from the specified sender to the specified recipient otherwise to all.

  • Method Details

    • selectTiles

      void selectTiles(String playerID, List<Coordinates> coordinates) throws RemoteException
      Selects tiles by a player with the specified player ID.
      Parameters:
      playerID - the ID of the player.
      coordinates - the list of coordinates representing the selected tiles.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.

    • insertTiles

      void insertTiles(String playerID, List<Integer> sort, int column) throws RemoteException
      Inserts tiles by a player with the specified player ID into the specified column.
      Parameters:
      playerID - the ID of the player.
      sort - the list of integers representing the sorted tiles to insert.
      column - the column where the tiles should be inserted.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.

    • writeChat

      void writeChat(String from, String message, String to) throws RemoteException
      Writes a chat message from the specified sender to the specified recipient otherwise to all.
      Parameters:
      from - the ID of the sender.
      message - the chat message to send.
      to - the ID of the recipient.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.

    • addScout

      void addScout(String playerID, Scout scout) throws RemoteException
      Adds a scout with the specified player ID to the game.
      Parameters:
      playerID - the ID of the scout player.
      scout - the scout object to add.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.
